mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp(empid, mobile, sex, password, is_use, dateline) VALUES (#{empid}, #{mobile}, #{sex}, #{password}, #{is_use}, #{dateline})
mapper.update: UPDATE emp SET password=#{password} WHERE empid=#{empid}
mapper.select: SELECT sn.*, lcity.cityName as cityName, lpro.pname as pname, lchoose.chooseid as chooseid, lchoose.agestart as agestart, lchoose.ageend as ageend, lchoose.heightlstart as heightlstart, lchoose.heightlend as heightlend, lchoose.educationm as educationm, lchoose.marriagem as marriagem from emp sn LEFT JOIN province lpro ON lpro.provinceid = sn.provinceid LEFT JOIN city lcity ON lcity.cityid = sn.cityid LEFT JOIN happy_hand_choose lchoose ON lchoose.empid = sn.empid WHERE sn.empid=#{empid}
